IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'CKLeadLaunch' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[CKLeadLaunch] GO CREATE VIEW CKLeadLaunch AS
select CROpportunity.CompanyID, CROpportunity.LeadID, Contact.ContactID
from CROpportunity inner join Contact on CROpportunity.CompanyID = Contact.CompanyID and CROpportunity.LeadID = Contact.NoteID and CROpportunity.Status = 'W' where CROpportunity.CompanyID = 2 group by CROpportunity.CompanyID, CROpportunity.LeadID, Contact.ContactID
